    • About Me

    Hi I'm Nordin. This is my Web Development portfolio.

    I got my Bachelors in Mechanical Engineering but during my studies I discovered that I enjoy programming more. Now Iâ€™m learning Web Development through self-study with the help of The Odin Project. I immediately loved Web Dev from the moment I started, the reason is because I love being creative but also love problem solving, and this is the perfect mix of both.

    One of my biggest passions is 2D Animation and Drawing, I love visual art and everything that moves. I spend a lot of my time working on 2D animations, drawing each frame by hand. I also do a lot of 2D compositing in After Effects, in order to add effects and camera motion to animations. Because of these skills I have developed a good sense of timing when it comes to animating with keyframes
